data.fullContent: When Adam took over as the new hospital chief, he knew that he had his work cut out for him. The hospital had been losing money for years, and Adam was determined to turn it around. He started evaluating each department and found that the biggest problem was in the supply department. Adam reorganized the supply department and managed to cut costs by 75% within a year. He then took on the job of raising public awareness about the hospital. He conducted interviews with local news affiliates and hired a web developer to improve the hospital's website. The public's response was greater than he had expected.

q1.translation: 当亚当接任医院主任时，他知道他的工作很适合他。这家医院多年来一直在亏损，亚当决心扭转局面。他开始评估每个部门，发现最大的问题在供应部。亚当重组了供应部，在一年内成功地削减了75%的成本。随后，他承担起了提高公众对该医院认识的工作。

options.sentence: Adam wasn't sure the board of directors would approve of the major changes he wanted to make, but he was confident he could earn their support.
The previous chief had accumulated a huge backlog of patient records and hospital policies that needed to be cleared out.
Adam hired a physical therapist because he wanted someone who could take over his duties as the director of therapy.
The supply department was costing the hospital a lot of money, so Adam reorganized it and managed to cut costs by 75% within a year.
